meanings.definition: The state or quality of being sufficient.
meanings.sent1: Her sufficiencies in math helped her ace the test.
meanings.sent2: He had just enough sufficiencies to complete the project on time.
meanings.sent3: The cat's sufficiencies in catching mice made it the neighborhood hero.
meanings.sent4: His sufficiencies in leadership shone brightly during the crisis.
meanings.sent5: The sufficiencies of water in the desert are life-saving.

meanings.sent1: The sufficiencies of food kept the hikers energized.
meanings.sent2: She had sufficiencies of time to finish her homework before dinner.
meanings.sent3: The sufficiencies of laughter filled the room with joy.
meanings.sent4: His sufficiencies of courage amazed everyone around him.
meanings.sent5: The sufficiencies of love in their relationship were evident to all.
